trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartAdding> event is raised by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.OnWebPartAdding%2A> method just before adding a control to a Web Parts zone.
This event provides an opportunity to cancel the process before it is complete.
The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartAdded> event is called after a control has been added to a Web Parts zone.
The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartAddingEventArgs> class contains information that can be used within a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartAdding> event.
It provides access to the Web Parts control that is being added and the zone it is being added to.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartAddingEventArgs"></xref> class.
The <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> (or server or user control) to be added to a Web page or opened on a page.
The that webPart is being added to.
An integer that represents the ordinal position that webPart occupies in zone, relative to other controls in zone.
Gets or sets the Web Parts zone that the Web Parts control is being added to.
The <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase"></xref> that the Web Parts control is being added to.
Gets or sets the index position of a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> control within its zone.

The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartAddingEventArgs.ZoneIndex%2A> property indicates the numerical order (or ordinal position) within the zone for the Web Parts control being added in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartAdded> event.
The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> control uses this property to track and manage its collection of Web Parts controls on a Web page.

The value of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartAddingEventArgs.ZoneIndex%2A> property for a control might not equal the index value for the same control within the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.WebParts%2A> collection.
The numerical order of a control within its zone.
The first control in a zone has an index value of zero.
